Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.name: sendinblue

module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: vatnumber
module.description: Enables you to enter the intra-community VAT number when creating the address. You must fill in the company field to allow entering the VAT number
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Enables you to enter the intra-community VAT number when creating the address. You must fill in the company field to allow entering the VAT number.

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Manage all your automated web tasks from a single interface.

module.name: onboarding
module.description: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps.

module.name: veplatform
module.displayName: VePlatform: Увеличьте конверсии из брошенных корзин
module.description: Мгновенно увеличьте свои продажи, подключив решения VePlatform по ремаркетингу и возобновлению взаимодействия, обеспечив конверсии посетителей, покинувших Ваш сайт
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Мгновенно увеличьте свои продажи, подключив решения VePlatform по ремаркетингу и возобновлению взаимодействия, обеспечив конверсии посетителей, покинувших Ваш сайт.Пройдите по ссылке и подключитесь к VePlatform прямо сейчас!
module.additional_description: Благодаря интеграции с VePlatform Вы получите немедленный доступ к ее спектру решений по ремаркетингу и возобновлению взаимодействия, которые созданы для того, чтобы:Понизить показатель отказа (bounce rate)Повысить взаимодействие с клиентамиПовысить конверсии, сократив долю брошенных корзинПовысить доходность кампанииСоздать дополнительные доходы

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SMB Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: paygreen
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.additional_description: This payment module allows you to customize your payment page:Your payment page with your colorsOccasionally organize fundraising operations for organizations of your choiceEnable / Disable 3D secure systemSubmit a recurring payment to your customers Our pricing is based on your monthly sales volume : PayGreen is one of the most economical solutions on the market. Our pricing fits your monthly turnover.

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Three delivery methods in Belgium   With Shipping Manager, you integrate our three delivery methods directly into your online shop, so your customers are able to choose the one they prefer.To a private address: such as home, office or a family member.To one of our 1250 pick-up points: post offices or post points like supermarkets (Delhaize, Spar), bookshops (Press Shop, Relay), service stations (Total, Q8) and neighbourhood stores.To one of our 150 parcel lockers: ideally situated in high footfall locations, stations and shopping centres. Simplifying your logistics   With the Shipping Manager, your customers select their delivery method when they place their order online. You just need to take care of the practical aspects.Follow-up and preparation of your parcelsCreation of shipping and return labels, both domestic and internationalManagement of parcels shipmentsTracking  of your parcels  This add-on is available for free to all customers who have a signed parcels contract with bpost.
module.additional_description: Shipping Manager is an application that helps you manage your parcel shipments and create your shipping and return labels, both domestic and international. • Easy to integrate, plug and play. • Simple integration in your online shop: during the order process your customers will not even notice they have been transferred to Shipping Manager • Immediate access to the three bpost delivery methods: o Home delivery o Delivery to a pick-up point o Delivery to a parcel locker • Management of your parcel deliveries through the Administration module (label printing, parcel tracking, parcel preparation follow-up). • Thanks to its adaptive design, the graphical user interface automatically changes to suit the customer’s viewing device (smartphone, tablet, PC). • Configuration of prices based on delivery method, immediately visible in the online shop • Access to the most popular options for your shipments (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) • Printing directly from the backend of Prestashop • Track and trace your parcels online from the backend

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: advancedeucompliance
module.description: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: eurovatgenerator
module.description: Easily get compliant with the new European VAT rules for virtual products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Easily get compliant with the new European VAT rules for virtual products.

module.name: famebit
module.description: FameBit is the first and largest marketplace for connecting brands with YouTubers across the world for product endorsements
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: FameBit is the first and largest marketplace for connecting brands with YouTubers across the world for product endorsements. FameBit brings YouTube creators to you making it easy to work with the most influential content creators on YouTube. Drive brand awareness, increase purchase intent, and trend with the next generation of consumers through creative content they trust.
module.additional_description: The easiest and quickest way to connect with social media influencers and stars. It's completely free to post a campaign and start receiving proposals from influencers that want to work with your brand. Best yet interested YouTubers come to you saving you a ton of time and unanswered emails.

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop.

module.name: financementparticipatifcreditfr
module.description: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.additional_description: Borrow directly from individuals at competitive rates Thanks to a new type of financing without any bank ! Enjoy a quick and easy credit, seamlessly You make an online request to immediately know your eligibility to our financing offer. You get a response within 48 hours. You know exactly how many fees you will pay and you can follow your transaction 100% online via your customer space on Credit.fr Finance all your development projects With Credit.fr, you can finance different kind of projects:Any type of material (Computer Telephony, Medical Office, Medical,)Machine & ToolIntangible / WebsiteTourism / Utility / Industrial VehicleWorks / Facilities / Real EstateBusiness Takeover (the target must be over 4 years)Franchise / Admission Feed (franchisor of over 4 years)Research & DevelopmentBuyout of Partners Current Accounts

module.name: 11hosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: amzpayments
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Payments can help merchants add new customers, increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business. If you are based in the UK please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments  If you are based in the USA please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments
module.additional_description: Make it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay in your Prestashop shop, using the addresses and payment information stored in their Amazon accounts. It's fast, simple and secure.

module.name: safeshops
module.description: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law. After filling in a questionnaire with tips, an independent law firm will lead you through the legal jungle and provide you with the necessary documents like general conditions, privacy/cookie policies. So, join the fastest growing label community of Belgium and enhance trust in your online sales.
module.additional_description: Why choose this service?   °Boost your customer relations °Enhance trust °Alleviate customer disputes   Choose the SafeShops Label and:   ° Promote confidence in your webshop ° Take advantage of personal legal support ° Receive e-commerce general conditions and standard documents in 4 languages. ° Increase your cross-border sales with the Emota Label ° Be part of a very dynamic e-community ° Take part in the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights (www.shoppingnights.be) ° Avoid fines and complaints.   Choose the SafeShops Label and avoid extra legal costs.   Webshops have to comply with manifold legislation.  European, local and sector bound legislation will vary…   This is the reason why Prestashop collaborates with SafeShops.  SafeShops  will  give you legal advise by setting-up your webshop.  You will receive general conditions and a privacy policy (D/Fr/E/G) that can be adapted to your specific case, in dialog with an independent lawyer.  SafeShops keeps you informed about the ever changing legislation.  SafeShops Label enhances your consumer confidence.  All this for € 295/year.   European Label as a bonus SafeShops is accredited in Europe, you will also obtain the European Emota Label. This is a nice bonus for those eager to do business abroad.   Knowledge exchange in an accessible and open community SafeShops represents more than a Label.  Besides the open community with the label certification, our free SafeShops Café offers you interesting presentations from partners and other webshops.  You will also enjoy discounts on trainings, seminars and conferences.      Inclusive our 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights Safeshops also organizes yearly the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights.  A campaign (radio and e-mail) where you can highlight your webshop during 7 nights and gather some extra attention.  All included in the certification cost. For more information please visit www.shoppingnight.be.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.

module.name: hotlineautomatisehipaymobile
module.description: Automated hotline service to simplify call management on your shop. Quickly integrate your free your hotline. Offer a dedicated phone number and get the best market conditions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automated hotline service to simplify call management on your shop. Quickly integrate your free your hotline. Offer a dedicated phone number and get the best market conditions. ************ This service is available for Fance only ***********
module.additional_description: Simplify communication with your customers by providing a single contact numberInform or assist your clientsGenerate additional revenue with premium number optionAnalyze the behavior of callers and optimize your marketing campaigns

module.name: dhlparcelbelux
module.categoryName: Пункты выдачи и Получение в магазине
module.description: The DHL Parcel shipping module allows you to integrate different delivery options into the checkout of your web shop, so your customers can choose their preferred delivery method: home delivery (Benel
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DHL Parcel shipping module allows you to integrate different delivery options into the checkout of your web shop, so your customers can choose their preferred delivery method: home delivery (Benelux and rest of Europe)delivery in a DHL Parcelshop (Benelux only)For home deliveries in the Benelux you can offer your customers further delivery options: no neighbour deliveryevening delivery (Tuesday to Thursday)Saturday delivery.  The DHL Parcel shipping module is free of charge, but you will need a DHL Parcel account to get access to our services.
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rate by letting your customers choose where and when they want to have their shipment delivered: at a DHL Parcelshop or at home, during the day, in the evening or on Saturday. You decide which delivery options you want to offer your customers.   DHL Parcel has a dense network of DHL Parcelshops with extended opening hours, even during the weekend. At present there are 2300 DHL Parcelshops in the Benelux, 1100 of which are situated in Belgium. Furthermore DHL Parcel offers evening and Saturday deliveries within the whole Benelux territory.

module.name: steerfox
module.description: Increase the ROI of your multi-source campaigns. Use our automated bid manager and stay focused on your traffice acquisition strategy
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase the ROI of your multi-source campaigns. Use our automated bid manager and stay focused on your traffice acquisition strategy.
module.additional_description: The only module protecting your product feed from the eyes of your competitors : Steerfox is the only web solution securising the transfer of your product feed between your website and Google. Generate traffic from your product catalog Choose your budget depending on the desired traffic to your or your shops. No commitment is required. Our robots boost sales of your e-commerce site. SteerFox:recognizes your products,Complete information,optimize their presence on all channels, article by article.Increase productivity Generate campaigns automatically from your product catalog. Our robots analyze it -as well as your competition- to create the best advertising campaigns in suitable formats: text ads or banners. Steerfox outperform digital agencies through its robots that generate significant savings in terms of time and campaign management cost. Manage multiple sources intelligently Our buying traffic tool connects to multiple audiences (Google Adwords, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, Amazon, Facebook Product Ads, Criteo ...). It creates, manages and optimizes your campaigns in relation with the back office suppliers. SteerFox provides a report of the consolidated results on a single page. Increase your traffic from 60 to 120% Increase the ROI of your campaigns from 30 to 60% Get almost immediate results

module.name: eo_wing
module.description: At Wing, we pick up all your products, professionnaly pack them and ship them using the lowest rate !
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At Wing, we pick up all your products, professionnaly pack them and ship them using the lowest rate !
module.additional_description: - TIME : Don't waste one more minute on packaging or dropping your products at the post office. - SAVINGS :  Save money thanks to the low rates we have negotiated for you among major carriers  - QUALITY : Get your shipments packed by trained experts using high-quality materials- SIMPLE : Directly integrated with your store you can focus on what you send, not how- CUSTOMIZATION : Stickers, goodies, inserts, large or irregular items ? No worries, we will shape your ideas- TRACKING : Track all your packages and easily notify your customers in real time

module.name: googleshopping
module.description: Приложение Google Shopping поможет вам предлагать свои товары тем, кому они интересны, и всегда в нужный момент
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Приложение Google Shopping поможет вам предлагать свои товары тем, кому они интересны, и всегда в нужный момент. С ним ваши продажи вырастут не менее чем на 30%!
module.additional_description: Это приложение позволит вам показать свои товары, сообщить их цены и представить свою компанию пользователям Google Поиска. Ваши объявления будут видны как на компьютерах, так и на планшетах и смартфонах. Преимущества: Больше посещений. Ежемесячно в Google Поиске совершают около ста миллиардов запросов, и ваши предложения будут появляться в ответ на многие из них. Экономия времени и сил. Чтобы сообщить Google данные о товарах, не нужно создавать дополнительные файлы. Все сведения можно импортировать напрямую из платформы PrestaShop. Отсутствие ошибок. Все изменения, которые вы вносите в информацию о товарах в PrestaShop, передаются в Google автоматически. Выше коэффициент конверсии. Он увеличится благодаря квалифицированному трафику и вашему рейтингу в системе поиска.

module.name: themoneytizer
module.description: The Moneytizer module will make you generate income monetizing your order confirmation pages and/or integrating ads in your pages
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Moneytizer module will make you generate income monetizing your order confirmation pages and/or integrating ads in your pages. Place your tags in as little as two mouse clicks and start earning additional income always keeping your clients !
module.additional_description: This module will significantly increase your daily turnover offering your clients exclusive advantages. The Moneytizer is a « Club des Avantages » partner. The purpose of this club is to allow clients to benefit from exclusive advantages (e.g. refund of 15 euros for the first order, free delivery, 15% off your next purchases) all year round. Using the module to place our banner – Moneyback – on your order confirmation pages, will make you earn 10 euros for each new client signing up for the « Club des Avantages ». The order is already placed, you never loose or drive any of your clients away ! Following is the process : 1.     Place our banner – Moneyback – on your order confirmation pages2.     Once the client clicks on the banner, he is redirected to the registration page of the « Club des Avantages » shopping portal3.     When a client signs up, you earn 10 euros. Correct ! 100 registrations, mean indeed 1000 euros revenues derived from that single banner ! The « Club des Avantages » administers all the member’s advantages through its dedicated customer service. What is the role of the e-merchant then ? He just has to reap gains derived from registrations. Your site is getting a lot of hits ? Just do like the biggest e-merchants and earn revenues placing banners on your pages ! You will be paid for each view ! The module facilitates the insertion of any kind of ad unit on your website. Our offer is 100% free and without obligation.
